261688.「あの程度が ヤツの仕業のはずもない。\n 次は もっと 手強いのを頼む。:
There's no way he could have done that. Next
time, I want something tougher.

261689.「お前も師匠も ヤツの気配を感じとった。\n ダークネスが現れるところを つぶし:
You and your master have both sensed his presence. If you keep crushing the places where Darkness appears, you will surely see
him again soon.

261690.「……憎悪の色が 極端に濃くなっている。\n 感情の暴走は 身の破滅につながるわ:
...is a very intense hatred. Emotional
outbursts can be your own undoing. If
something were to happen to you...

261692.「だが 自分がどうなろうが 知ったことか。\n ヤツは 絶対に 追いつめる。\n:
But I don't care what happens to me. I will
definitely hunt him down. I will surely kill
him with my own hands.

261693.「彼はディゼル。ここで いちばんのウデ利きよ。\n 見ての通り 不愛想だけど\n:
He is Diezel. He's the best in the place. As you can see, he's not very sociable, but he's like that with everyone, so don't worry about
it.

261694.「魔剣士は 心に闇を抱えた\n ワケありの人たち。彼の抱えている闇は\n 特に深:
Demon swordsmen are people with a Dark Mind.
The darkness he carries is especially deep,
dark...

261695.「でも あなただって……そうでしょう？\n 自分では 気づいていないかもしれない:
But even you... don't you? You may not be
aware of it, but you are living with a great
Dark Mind and pain inside.

261696.「これまで感じてきた 悲しみや絶望 憎悪……\n その痛みは すべて あなたのチ:
All the sadness, despair, and hatred you've
ever felt... all that pain will be your
strength. You will be strong.

261697.「……さて。さっそく あなたに\n 頼みたいことがあるから\n 魔剣士に転職して:
...Well. Right away, I have a favor to ask of
you...will you change your job to demon
swordsman and come back to see me again?

261698.「魔剣士の戦い方について 知りたければ\n あそこに すわっている\n ギブソン:
If you want to know how demon swordsmen fight,
ask Mr. Gibson sitting over there.

261699.「あなたには 期待してるわ。\n これから よろしくね。:
I have high expectations for you. I'm looking
forward to working with you.
